value: Hello young slave and welcome to the Colosseum of Rome. Now you have to fight as a gladiator with the help of your ||creature|| against opponents and their creatures to obtain the emperors favour and attain freedom.
title: Spartacus:

value: My name is Spartacus and I'm already a famous gladiator. I'll accompany you on your way to liberty and support you wherever I can.
title: Spartacus:

value: Listen! The horn calls us for the first fight! Good luck my friend.
title: Spartacus

value: You are attacked by a gladiator and his ||enemy||

That was impressive, you did a good job! And look your ||creature|| went one level up. But there's still a long way to go on wich you have to fight a lot. From now I'm not going to help you with your fights anymore, but don't worry because you'll gain more and more experience and your ||creature|| will become stronger. Look, your next enemy is already waiting for you!
